bhulo pamini nishshanka diddeniya, manike aththanayaka, natyaya - widhura (nithignya chals dayas)gayanaya - manike aththanayaka,nishshanka diddeniyabhulo pamini raga beleni//bandagena sitha yam kenekuge warasara//bhulo pamini raga beleni//aanthra wedo erandathitanaralowa gamanin nupurudu thopata//baya nosithuwa mana mema ganamema gana//baya nosithuwa mana mema ganamema gana//bhulo pamini raga beleni// sangraha kale dan natyaya - padmawathi (nithignya chals dayas)gayanaya - nishshanka diddeniyasangraha dan kale prithi sithhi mage pawathisangraha dan kale prithi sithhi ape pawathiraja mehi pathwu sanda ma sith bo priya wi medaraja mehi pathwu sanda apa sith bo priya wi medapawathiwa boho kal mithudam sathosa//sangraha dan kale prithi sithhi mage pawathisangraha dan kale prithi sithhi ape pawathima sithhi bose bose aththe mayi lesa pawasuyeapa sithhi bose bose aththe mayi lesa pawasuyedan yamu wasana nolasa sathosa//sangraha dan kale prithi sithhi mage pawathisangraha dan kale prithi sithhi ape pawathi pada pada dan naga natyaya -shakunthala (nithignya jon da silwa)gayanaya - nishshanka diddeniya,nirosha wirajinipada pada dan nagaayi da yanta nikmunepada pada dan nagaayi da yanta siduwune//sitha bandune dutu esanenethu pinuneya rubarisitha bandune dutu esanenethu pinuneya swaminepami pami ma senepada pada ...kiritaye dilena me shiromani bandu //mage me shiromani bandu //thopa daka kelesa indimisobana rusirathi landaoba daka kelesa yami dasobana rusiru rajinda maparasidu rusirathi landakulangana me mata niyamenoduwanu mage aadarepami pami thi keresitha bandune dutu esanenethu pinuneya swaminepami pami ma senepada pada ...
